questions.question_text: What is your gender?
Here is a list of things some young people your age have. Please tell us which ones you have - Some pocket money each week to spend on yourself
Here is a list of things some young people your age have. Please tell us which ones you have - Some money that you can save each month, either in a bank or at home
Here is a list of things some young people your age have. Please tell us which ones you have - A pair of designer or brand name trainers (like Nike or Vans)
Here is a list of things some young people your age have. Please tell us which ones you have - An iPod or other personal music player
Here is a list of things some young people your age have. Please tell us which ones you have - A smartphone
Here is a list of things some young people your age have. Please tell us which ones you have - Cable or satellite TV at home
Here is a list of things some young people your age have. Please tell us which ones you have - A garden at home, or somewhere nearby like a park where you can safely spend time with your friends
Here is a list of things some young people your age have. Please tell us which ones you have - A family car for transport when you need it
Here is a list of things some young people your age have. Please tell us which ones you have - The right kind of clothes to fit in with other people your age
Here is a list of things some young people your age have. Please tell us which ones you have - At least one family holiday away from home each year
Here is a list of things some young people your age have. Please tell us which ones you have - Family trips or days out at least once a month

response_table.response: Quite a lot of the time

questions.question_text: How much do you agree with these statements about school? - I understand my lessons

To what extent do you agree with the following statements: - Teachers should take more account of students' interests when deciding what to teach.
To what extent do you agree with the following statements: - Having to do tests at school helps me to learn.
To what extent do you agree with the following statements: - I rarely prepare or revise for tests I have at school.
To what extent do you agree with the following statements: - I normally do well in tests compared to other people.

What qualities of a teacher do you rate most highly? Please place the following in rank order: - Good at explaining and talking about the subject.
What qualities of a teacher do you rate most highly? Please place the following in rank order: - Good at making lessons fun and engaging.
What qualities of a teacher do you rate most highly? Please place the following in rank order: - Good to talk to - friendly and approachable.
What qualities of a teacher do you rate most highly? Please place the following in rank order: - Good at providing feedback on work.
